plot: Marge's new SUV gives her a potent case of road rage.

Homer buys a Canyonero utility vehicle but finds it was intended for women to drive so he gives it to Marge. Marge soon gets into her new vehicle,becoming prone to road rage,for which she arrested by Wiggum. However,when the rest of the family are trapped by an escaped rhinoceros at the zoo,Marge's reckless driving comes in handy at saving them.—don @ minifie-1
